links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Peter Howell'''(b. [[1919]] - [[20 April]] [[2015]]) voiced the part of [[Saruman]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4.
